description: Enjoy excellent local hams and salami and other delicious regional specialities in this welcoming restaurant. The room with the typical fogolar stove is particularly charming, as is the one embellished with the fresco of Bacchus; the romantic terrace in the historic palazzo’s inner courtyard is also perfect in fine weather. Five delightful apartments with a mezzanine and cooking area are also available.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
